code:
import axios from'axios';const API_URL='http://localhost:5000';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_URL,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});// Add token to requests if available
api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token&&config.headers){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;});export const authService={login:async data=>{const response=await api.post('/login',data);return response.data;},register:async data=>{const response=await api.post('/registro',data);return response.data;},updateUser:async(userId,data)=>{const response=await api.put("/usuarios/".concat(userId),data);return response.data;},deleteUser:async userId=>{await api.delete("/usuarios/".concat(userId));}};export default api;
